speaker.name: Kasia JastrzÄ™bska
speaker.about: Frontend developer with over 6 years of experience around various frameworks and libs knowledge in my basket (such as React+Redux, Polymer, Ember, Backbone). Always eager to go deeper ;D

session.title: Styled Components, SSR, and Theming
session.description: All you need to know to become hero of CSS-in-JS with `styled-components`. We will go through the new API, performance improvements, server side rendering with Next.js and the theming manager available with v2 of `styled-components`.
